translation: MassCraft | 批量合成刷新优化
SortEmptyBox | 空潜影盒堆叠整理

source_string:
Set to true if the server is running the Carpet mod,
and has the ctrlQCrafting option enabled.
This just changes which method Item Scroller uses
for the Drop key + Shift + Right click crafting.
translation:
如果服务器正在运行地毯端则建议开启
这将改变物品滚轮整组丢弃的使用方式
变为 丢弃快捷键+Shift+右击

source_string:
Enable updating the crafting recipe output directly on the client side.
This fixes the quick/mass crafting and right-click-to-craft-a-stack
features otherwise being broken in 1.12.
translation:
在客户端直接更新合成配方输出
这修正了在1.12中快速/批量制造和右键点击制造所产生的不可使用的问题

source_string:
If enabled, then the recipe items are also rendered
in the crafting recipe view.
translation: 启用后, 配方物品也将呈现于合成配方视图中

source_string: Enables some debug messages in the game console
translation: 启用后, 将会输出调试信息到游戏控制台中

source_string: Can disable all the functionality of the entire mod

Prevent recipe output slot updates in the middle of moving items
to the crafting grid. This should reduce CPU usage
because of not constantly querying the recipe after every grid change.
translation:
禁止批量合成时配方输出槽在材料移动到合成GUI的过程中更新. 
这将会减少CPU的占用, 因为游戏会在每次合成配方更改后
不断地查询配方并显示产物

source_string: The interval in game ticks the massCraft operation is repeated at

How many massCraft iterations/attempts to do per execution.
With unstackable items or a full inventory and "small recipe"
this will need to be larger, as a shift + click craft to the inventory
might only craft 1 or 2 items per operation.
translation:
设置每次执行多少次批量合成的迭代或者尝试, 
适用于当玩家合成不可堆叠的物品或玩家背包已满这类情况, 
这将需要玩家拥有更大的背包空间, 
因为使用shift单击合成时, 
背包中可能只进行1或2次合成操作

source_string:
Uses a newer method of filling the crafting grid,
using only swap slot packets.

Note: Due to only using slot swap packets,
no partial crafts are possible! And also no
stack splitting will happen, at all.
translation:
使用新的方法填充配方GUI, 
即只使用slot swap packets(槽位交换包)
注意: 由于只使用槽位交换包, 不可能有部分的合成! 
而且也不会发生整组物品拆开的现象

source_string:
The limit of sent emulated slot click packets per game tick,
if 'rateLimitClickPackets' is enabled
translation: 当 §6[连点限制]§f 开启后每个tick发送的最大模拟操作数据包的数量

source_string:
If enabled, then the crafting features recipes are saved to a file
inside minecraft/itemscroller/recipes_worldorservername.nbt.
This makes the recipes persistent across game restarts.
translation:
启用后, 合成配方将保存到文件
"Minecraft/itemscroller/recipes_worldorservername.nbt"
中. 这可以使得合成配方在游戏重启后能保持不变

source_string:
If true, then the recipe file is global, instead
 of being saved per-world or server
translation: 启用后, 将会使配方文件全局化, 而不是对每个世界或服务器单独保存

source_string:
This is meant for compatibility with Spigot servers and similar,
which apply rate limits to packets from the client.
This queues up the emulated slot click packets and sends
them rate limited over time. The limit per game tick can be set in 'packetRateLimit´.
translation:
为了与Spigot和类似服务器兼容, 
发送的数据包发送速率进行限制. 
这将模拟正常操作的数据包排队, 
并随着时间的推移以一定速率发送数据包. 
每个tick的限制可以在 §6[最大数据流]§f 中设置

source_string: Reverse the scrolling direction for single item mode.
translation: 反转滚动方向为单个物品移动模式

source_string: Reverse the scrolling direction for full stacks mode.
translation: 反转滚动方向为单组物品移动模式

source_string:
Enables caching the last used recipe in the crafting
recipe output item fetching code. This can help a lot
with lowering CPU usage when mass crafting stuff.
translation:
在合成配方操作获取输出项参数时, 
传递缓存中最后使用的配方参数. 
当大量合成物品时, 这可以大大降低CPU使用率

source_string:
When enabled, the item movement direction depends
on the slots' y-position on screen. Might be derpy with more
complex inventories, use with caution!
translation:
启用后, 物品的移动方向将取决于屏幕上栏位的y轴位置. 
在更复杂的物品栏中可能会出现问题, 谨慎使用!

source_string:
Whether or not global (per-item-type) villager trade
favorites should be used.
translation: 启用后, 收藏的交易项目将会被置顶

source_string:
Remember and restore the last scroll position in the
trade list when re-opening the GUI
translation: 启用后, 退出村民交易GUI将不会重置滚动条

source_string:
Assume that empty boxes are stacking items
when sorting the inventory.
This is useful if you installed mods to stack
shulker boxes on remote server.
This will send an extra packet to ensure the
inventory is synced.
translation:
整理物品栏时假设空潜影盒可以堆叠. 
当你在远程服务器启用此特性时会很有用. 
这会多发送一个网络包来确保服务器同步

source_string:
Sort shulker boxes at the end of the inventory
when sorting the inventory.
translation: 整理物品栏时将潜影盒放在最后

source_string:
Enables scrolling items to and from crafting grids,
with a built-in 18 recipe memory.
Hold down the Recipe key to see the stored recipes and
to change the selection. While holding the Recipe key,
you can either scroll or press a number key to change the selection.
A recipe is stored to the currently selected "recipe slot"
 by clicking pick block over a configured crafting output slot.
The supported crafting grids must be added to the scrollableCraftingGrids list.
translation:
开启内置共8页每页18种配方的存储, 使得物品可以放置到合成表. 
按住 §6[配方视图]§f 查看配方列表, 并可以通过滑动滚轮或数字键选择配方, 点击配方可以在工作台完成合成. 
在放置配方达到待命状态(不取出合成产物)时, 按下 §6[储存配方]§f 就可以在选定的位置进行配方储存(旧配方将被覆盖)

source_string:
Enables dropping all matching items from the same
inventory with the hotkey
translation: 按下 §6[全部丢弃]§f 快捷键后从同一库存内丢弃所有匹配的物品

source_string:
Enables crafting up to one full stack when right clicking on
a slot that has been configured as a crafting output slot.
translation: 右键点击储存的配方后将直接合成一个物品

source_string:
Enables scroll moving all items at once while
holding the modifierMoveEverything keybind
translation: 按住 §6[滚动所有]§f 快捷键时, 允许滑动滑轮来移动所有物品

source_string:
Enables scroll moving all matching stacks at once
while holding the modifierMoveMatching keybind
translation: 按住 §6[滚动相同]§f 快捷键时, 允许滑动滑轮来移动所有匹配的物品

source_string: Enables moving items one item at a time by scrolling over a stack
translation: 在不按住任何快捷键时, 允许滑动滑轮来移动单个物品

source_string: Enables moving entire stacks at a time by scrolling over a stack
translation: 按住 §6[滚动一份]§f 快捷键时, 允许滑动滑动来移动整组物品

source_string:
Enables a "fallback" mode for scrolling entire stacks
(for example to a vanilla crafting table,
where shift + click doesn't work).
translation:
将启用"回放"的滚动模式. 
(在工作台等位置可能减少发包)

source_string:
Enables special handling for the Villager GUIs.
(Normally you can't shift click items in them.)
Hold shift and scroll up/down over the trade output slot.
translation: 为交易GUI进行特殊处理, 允许对输出位的物品进行滚动来进行快速交易

source_string:
Enables dropping all matching items at once by holding
shift while clicking to drop a stack
translation: 允许通过按住 shift 键并单击物品时扔出所有匹配的物品

source_string:
Enables moving all matching stacks at once by holding
shift while placing items to an empty slot
translation: 允许通过按住 shift 键并将物品放置在空位时移动所有匹配的物品

source_string:
Enable trade favoriting and quick trade features for villagers.
Note: The Shift + scrolling over the output slot is a separate feature
and not affected by this option.
This option enables middle clicking to mark favorite trades,
and right clicking on the trade list to fully trade that one trade.
translation:
为村民启用交易收藏和快速交易功能. 
注意: §6[滚动交易]§f 是一个单独的功能, 不受此选项的影响. 
此选项允许通过单击鼠标中键来标记最喜欢的交易, 
并开启在交易列表上右键单击物品购空物品的功能

source_string: Craft everything possible once with the currently selected recipe
translation: 用当前选定的配方消耗完所有的材料进行合成

source_string: Drop all stacks identical to the hovered stack
translation: 丢弃所有与鼠标指针指向的物品向匹配的物品

source_string:
Mass craft and throw out the results with the
currently selected recipe as long as this
keybind is held down
translation:
批量合成当前选择的配方并将产物丢出, 
需要你按住快捷键

source_string:
Move all of the currently selected recipe's
output items from the player inventory
to the other inventory
translation: 将当前选择配方的所有材料全部放置于合成台上

source_string: Show the Item Scroller recipe GUI
Print debug info for the hovered slot or GUI
translation:
打印鼠标悬停栏位或GUI的调试信息
(译注: 非调试时无需设置)

source_string: Store a recipe while hovering over a crafting output item
translation: 当鼠标悬停在合成输出项目上时, 存储当前的合成配方

source_string:
Throw all of the currently selected recipe's
output items to the ground from the player inventory
translation: 批量丢出当前选择配方中的输出物品

source_string:
Trade everything possible with all the favorited trades
of the current villager
translation: 按下快捷键时将尝试一键买空所有收藏的交易内容

source_string: Key to drop all but the last item from each stack dragged over
translation: 按住快捷键丢弃物品, 被指到的物品仅保留一个

source_string: Key to drop one item from each stack dragged over
translation: 按住快捷键丢弃物品, 被指到的物品仅丢弃一个

source_string: Key to drop the entire stacks dragged over
translation: 按住快捷键丢弃物品, 被指到的格子全部丢弃

source_string:
Key to move all but the last item from
all the stacks dragged over
translation: 按住快捷键移动物品, 被指到的物品仅保留一个

source_string: Key to move all matching items dragged over
translation: 按住快捷键移动所有相同物品

source_string: Key to move one item from each stack dragged over
translation: 按住快捷键移动物品, 被指到的物品仅移动一个

source_string: Key to move the entire stacks dragged over
translation: 按住快捷键移动物品, 被指到的格子全部移动

source_string:
Key to move ALL items to the other
inventory when clicking a stack
translation: 点击物品时, 将所有物品移到另一个容器内

source_string:
The key to move all but the last item from each stack
"down" in the inventor
translation: 将库存中除最后一个物品之外的所有物品从每堆物品"向下"移动的键

source_string: The key to move all matching items "down" in the inventory
translation: 将库存中所有匹配的物品"向下"移动的键

source_string: The key to move single items "down" in the inventory
translation: 在库存中移动单个物品"向下"的键

source_string: The key to move stacks "down" in the inventory
translation: 在库存中移动一份物品"向下"的键

source_string:
The key to move all but the last item from each stack
"up" in the inventory
translation: 将库存中除最后一个物品之外的所有物品从每堆物品"向上"移动的键

source_string: The key to move all matching items "up" in the inventory
translation: 将库存中所有匹配的物品"向上"移动的键

source_string: The key to move single items "up" in the inventory
translation: 在库存中移动单个物品"向上"的键

source_string: The key to move stacks "up" in the inventory
translation: 在库存中移动一份物品"向上"的键

source_string:
Modifier key to move ALL items to the other
inventory when scrolling over a stack
translation:
当在物品上滚动时, 按下此键将会使所有物品移动到另一个库存
(这个快捷键并没有实际功能, 类似前缀)

source_string:
Modifier key to move all matching items to the other
inventory when scrolling over a stack
translation:
当在物品上滚动时, 按下此键将会使所有匹配的物品移动到另一个库存
(这个快捷键并没有实际功能, 类似前缀)

source_string:
Modifier key to move the entire stack to the other
inventory when scrolling over it
translation:
当在堆栈上滚动时, 修饰键将整个堆栈移动到另一个库存
(这个快捷键并没有实际功能, 类似前缀)

source_string:
Modifier key to hold while middle clicking a trade,
to toggle the global favorite state for that trade.
Global favorites are used for villagers that don't
have any "local"/villager-specific favorites set.
translation:
按住该快捷键时收藏的交易将进行全局收藏
全局收藏将会作用于所有村民

source_string: Sort the inventory that the cursor is hovering over
translation: 对鼠标指针所在的物品栏进行整理
Item Scroller 功能调整为: §c关闭
Item Scroller 功能调整为: §a开启
